text: Skype for Business (formerly Microsoft Lync and Office Communicator) was a software application for instant messaging and videotelephony. It was developed by Microsoft as part of the Microsoft Office suite. == History == Skype for Business was established in 2007 and launched on October 27, 2007. It was followed by Office Communicator 2007 R2, released on March 19, 2009. == Visions == Skype for Business has many visions such as; * Office Communicator 2007 * Office Communicator 2007 R2 * Lync 2010 * Lync 2013 * Skype for Business 2015 * Skype for Business 2016 * Skype for Business 2019 == References == Category:Microsoft Office category:2007 establishments
title: Skype for Business
